subject: CNN.com Daily Top 10
body:
CNN.com Daily Top 10


































Cho's professor: Don't feel guilty
Edward Falco, Cho's playwriting professor, writes to his classmates "all our hearts are broken...no need to add to the pain with guilt." 





2. Cowell: 'Idol' expression not related to Va. Tech

4. Police: Cho sent to counseling

6. FDA expands pet food recall 





7. VT victims had promising futures





8. Bombings in Baghdad kill scores





9. Birkhead: I get along with Stern





10. Abortion procedure ban upheld




 
















The 2-hour window
CNN's David Mattingly on what happened in the two hours between the first killings and the massacre at Virginia Tech (April 18)
